titles.title: Rice Farmer Fairness Act of 2003

To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to require, as a condition on the receipt of direct payments or counter-cyclical payments under such Act for rice produced by tenants and sharecroppers in Texas, that the producers on the farm agree to retain the rice cropland in production for the next crop year.

bill.summary: 4/2/2003--Introduced. Rice Farmer Fairness Act of 2003 - Amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to require, as a condition on the receipt of direct or counter-cyclical payments for rice produced in Texas by tenants or sharecroppers, that the producers on the farm agree to retain the rice cropland in production or cropping rotation for the next year.
